Typealiases.html#/s:5Async6Workera.name: Worker
Typealiases.html#/s:5Async6Workera.abstract: Workers are types that have a reference to an EventLoop.

Protocols/BasicWorker.html#/s:5Async11Ba.name: eventLoop
Protocols/BasicWorker.html#/s:5Async11Ba.abstract: This worker’s event loop. All async work done on this worker must occur on its EventLoop.

Protocols/FutureType.html#/s:5Async10Fut.name: eventLoop
Protocols/FutureType.html#/s:5Async10Fut.abstract: The event loop this future is fulfilled on.

Protocols/FutureType.html#/s:5Async10Fut.name: addAwaiter(callback:)
Protocols/FutureType.html#/s:5Async10Fut.abstract: Adds a new awaiter to this Future that will be called when the result is ready.

Protocols/BasicWorker.html.name: BasicWorker
Protocols/BasicWorker.html.abstract: A basic Worker type that has a single EventLoop.

Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to___3NIO15.name: map(to:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to___3NIO15.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when both futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to___3N.name: flatMap(to:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to___3N.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when both futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to____3NIO1.name: map(to:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to____3NIO1.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all three futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to____3.name: flatMap(to:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to____3.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all three futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to_____3NIO.name: map(to:_:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to_____3NIO.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all four futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to_____.name: flatMap(to:_:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to_____.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all four futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to______3NI.name: map(to:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async3map2to______3NI.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all five futures have completed.

Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to_____.name: flatMap(to:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:5Async7flatMap2to_____.abstract: Calls the supplied callback when all five futures have completed.

Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.name: future()
Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.abstract: Creates a new, succeeded Future from the worker’s event loop with a Void value.

Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.name: future(_:)
Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.abstract: Creates a new, succeeded Future from the worker’s event loop.

Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.name: future(error:)
Extensions/Worker.html#/s:3NIO14EventLoo.abstract: Creates a new, failed Future from the worker’s event loop.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: do(_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Adds a callback for handling this Future‘s result when it becomes available.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: catch(_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Adds a callback for handling this Future‘s result if an error occurs.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: always(_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Adds a handler to be asynchronously executed on completion of this future.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: map(on:_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Statically available method for mimicking behavior of calling return future.map where no starting future is available.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: flatMap(on:_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Statically available method for mimicking behavior of calling return future.flatMap where no starting future is available.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: map(to:_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Maps a Future to a Future of a different type.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: flatMap(to:_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Maps a Future to a Future of a different type.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: catchMap(_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Calls the supplied closure if the chained Future resolves to an Error.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: catchFlatMap(_:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Calls the supplied closure if the chained Future resolves to an Error.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: transform(to:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Maps the current future to contain the new type. Errors are carried over, successful (expected) results are transformed into the given instance.

Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.name: transform(to:)
Extensions/Future.html#/s:3NIO15EventLoo.abstract: Maps the current future to contain the new type. Errors are carried over, successful (expected) results are transformed into the given instance.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE2.name: do(on:_:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE2.abstract: Adds a callback for handling this [Future]‘s result when it becomes available.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE5.name: catch(on:_:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE5.abstract: Adds a callback for handling this [Future]‘s result if an error occurs.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE6.name: always(on:_:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE6.abstract: Adds a handler to be asynchronously executed on completion of these futures.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE1.name: syncFlatten(on:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE1.abstract: Flattens an array of lazy futures into a future with an array of results.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5Async3N.name: syncFlatten(on:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5Async3N.abstract: Flattens an array of lazy void futures into a single void future.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE7.name: flatten(on:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5AsyncE7.abstract: Flattens an array of futures into a future with an array of results.

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5Async3N.name: flatten(on:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl5Async3N.abstract: Flattens an array of void futures into a single one.

Extensions/EventLoop.html#/s:3NIO9EventL.name: newPromise(_:file:line:)
Extensions/EventLoop.html#/s:3NIO9EventL.abstract: Creates a new promise for the specified type.

Extensions/Worker.html.name: Worker
Extensions/Worker.html.abstract: Workers are types that have a reference to an EventLoop.

Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.name: error
Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.abstract: Returns the result error or nil if the result contains expectation.

Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.name: result
Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.abstract: Returns the result expectation or nil if the result contains an error.

Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.name: unwrap()
Enums/FutureResult.html#/s:5Async12Futur.abstract: Throws an error if this contains an error, returns the Expectation otherwise

Classes/QueueHandler.html#/s:5Async12Que.name: init(on:onError:)
Classes/QueueHandler.html#/s:5Async12Que.abstract: Create a new QueueHandler on the supplied worker.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
